name: Multiverse Marathon
description:
Escape from an ever-changing extradimensional maze in this challenging Time Attack 2D platformer!

Reach the portal in every stage before time runs out, or be devoured by the infinite abyss, never to find your way home. Clear 42 stages of the marathon in a row to regain your freedom!

If you enjoy the game, please leave us a comment and rate it. We're a small, 2-person indie studio and every little bit helps!

How To Play

Controls: Keyboard for gameplay, Mouse for Menus

A/D - move left/right
S - drop down from narrow platforms
Space - Jump

Join Us!

The moon is full of buried treasures, and we at Moon Mole Games  will unearth them for you! 

We release new games often, so follow us and be the first to play!

Twitter * Discord
